column2: "Na Taerehen Hiram somaa abɔfo ma wɔbaa David nkyɛn na wɔdze nkyindur ndua
"Na David hun dɛ EWURADZE etsintsim ne dzin ahyɛ no Israel do hen
column3: na osian ne man Israel ntsi

column2: "Na David warwaar yernom bi so wɔ Jerusalɛm: na David wowoo mbabanyin na mbabaa bi so bio."
"Na mba a onyae wɔ Jerusalɛm no hɔn edzin nye yi; Sammua
"Na aber a Filistiafo tsee dɛ wɔasera David ahyɛ no hen wɔ Israel nyinara do no
column3: Filistiafo no nyinara sii mu kɔr dɛ wɔrokɔhwehwɛ David akyer no: na David tsee
column4: na ofiir edzi kɔr hɔn do."

column2: "Nna Filistiafo aba dze abɛyer Refaim bɔnsa no mu."

column4: Ana momfow monkɔ Filistiafo no do a? Ana ibeyi hɔn ahyɛ me nsa a? Na EWURADZE see no dɛ
column5: Fow kɔ; na mibeyi hɔn ahyɛ wo nsa."

column3: na David kunkum hɔn wɔ hɔ; na David see dɛ
column4: Nyankopɔn nam me nsa do atsew m'atamfo mu
column5: dɛ nsu ntsewee. Dɛm ntsi wɔfrɛɛ bea no dzin dɛ Baal-perazim."

column2: "Na wɔdaan hɔn nyame gyaa hɔ; na David hyɛe ma wɔdze gya hyeew no."
"Na Filistiafo no sanee bae dze bɛyeer bɔnsa no mu bio."
"Na David bisaa Nyankopɔn bio; na Nyankopɔn see no dɛ
column3: Mma mmfow nnkɔ nnkedzi hɔn ekyir: dan fi hɔn nkyɛn
column4: na bra hɔn do wɔ bakandua no ne tsentsendo."

column3: sɛ etse nantsew ndze wɔ bakandua no etsifi a
column4: ɔno fir edzi kɔko: osiandɛ Nyankopɔn efir edzi dzi w'enyim dɛ orukoku Filistiafo dɔm no."

column2: "Na David yɛɛ dɛ mbrɛ Nyankopɔn hyɛɛ no no: na wokunkum Filistiafo dɔm no fi Gibeon araa dze kodur Gezer."
"Na David ne nka tahyee asaase nyinara do; na EWURADZE maa no ho suro baa amanaman nyinara do."
